column1: Back of length ball, on off stump and swings into the right hander, goes for the drive, gets the inner edge and races away down to fine leg fence for four
short in length, outside off, goes for the cut and gets beaten
again back of good length, just outside off, pushes it to off side for a single
on middle and leg stump, comes forward and drives to mid-on

Gone! Good length ball, pitches just outside off and swings into the right hander, hits the pad in front of off stump, big shout for lbw and up goes the finger of umpire, review has been taken and replay shows that was hitting top of off stump
good length ball, pitches on leg stump, tries to play on the leg side, hits high on the pad
full ball, on middle and leg stump, tucked away to deep midwicket for three runs
full ball, just outside off and moves away, goes for the drive and gets beaten
full ball, pitches looks outside leg, hits the pad and big shout for lbw, turned down by umpire, review has been taken and it was pitched outside leg
full ball, on off stump, pushes to cover for a single
Short in length, just outside off, stands tall and punches it away in the gap towards off side for four
Shot! Full ball just outside off, leans well forward and drives to deep cover fence for four
on middle and leg stump, works away to wide of midwicket for a single
Poor fielding at short fine leg. Good length ball on leg stump, flicks it away and it goes through the hands of short fine leg fielder for four
short of length, on off stump, goes back and pushes to off side
Shot! well wide outside off, Williams cracks it away to deep cover fence for four
short in length, on middle stump and swings away, lets it go through to keeper
good length ball, angling in, tries to defend, inside edge onto pad and gets a quick single
on middle and leg stump, works away to deep square leg fo a single
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, flicks it away to short fine leg and Haris misfielded cost four runs
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
full ball, on off stump, defended to cover
full ball, on middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on for a single
Gone! Full ball, on middle and leg stump, flicks away off his pads in the air and it goes straight in the hands of Haider who makes no mistake at deep midwicket
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to point
Back of length, just outside off, pushes to cover
short in length, goes for the pull, takes it on the thigh and takes a legbye
short ball, on middle and leg stump, pulls to deep square leg
full ball, on middle and leg stump, pushes to wide of mid-on for a single
back of length, goes for the drive, inner edge to leg side for a single
slightly short in length, on middle and leg stump, whips away to backward square leg for couple of runs
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to point
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-on for a single
on middle and leg stump, worked away to deep square leg for a single
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on
Shot! Full ball, on off stump, leans well forward and drives up and over mid-off for four
short in length, outside off, punches to deep point
full ball, on off stump, comes forward and drives to extra cover
good length ball, on off stump, punches to deep cover for a single
full ball, on middle and leg stump, drives to mid-on and good stop by Hasnain
short ball, angling away, goes for the pull and misses it
flipper on off stump, comes forward and defends to cover
short in length, on middle and leg stump, pulls to deep square leg
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, swept away to short fine leg for a quick single, direct hit from fielder but batsman was well home
Poor delivery, pitches short in length, goes back and pulls it away over deep midwicket fielder and fence for a six
tossed up, driven to mid-off for a single
Tossed up, was a googly, Williams hits up and over extra cover fielder and finds the gap for four
tossed up, on off stump, played a reverse sweep and beat the short third man fielder for four
short in length, goes back and cuts away to deep point
tossed up, on leg stump, went for the sweep, missed it and hit the pad, shout for lbw, turned down as it was missing leg
on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep midwicket for a single
arm ball, on off stump, punches down the ground to long-off for a single
tossed up, on middle and off, played a reverse sweep and failed to find the gap at short third man
tossed up, down on one knee and slog sweep to wide of long-on for a single
Usman gets his maiden T20I wicket. Tossed up, on off stump, came down the wicket and tried to play a big shot, missed it and ball hit the stumps
on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep midwicket for a single
tossed  up, on off stump, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
short in length, just outside off, cuts away to deep cover for a single
Short in length, outside off, goes back and cuts it away to backward point fence for four
short in length, goes back and punches hard to extra cover, Babar does well to stop the ball and looks in pain as he was rubbing his hand
Shot! Full ball, on off stump, leans well forward and drives on up to extra cover fence for four
short in length, just outside off, guides it to backward point for a single
short in length, on leg stump, whips it away and Usman fails to stop the ball at short fine leg
Good short ball with some pace, tries to fend it off, gest the top edge and Rizwan takes a good catch diving forward
short in length, just outside off, angles it down to third man for a single
short ball, outside off, pushes to point for a single
full and wide outside off, goes for the big drive and misses it
good length ball, on target, defended to off side for a quick single
short ball, tries to pulls it away, takes it on the pad, wants a run, sent back, Hasnain in his follow through, picks up but fails to hit the stumps
Tossed up, outside off, was a googly, went for the sweep and missed it, keeper failed to collect it properly and given away a bye
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side and Usman fielded himself

Flipper on leg stump, Madhevere went for the big shot and missed it, Rizwan took the bails off, shout for stumping, tv umpire comes in action, looks nothing behind the line but benefit doubt goes in favor of batsman
wrong one, tries to cut, inner edge and missed the stumps to short fine leg
flipper on offs tump, comes well forward and defended
Good length ball, comes down the wicket and slaps it away to backward point fence for four
short ball, this time he goes for the pull and finds the gap at deep midwicket for four more
back of length, on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side for a single
on middle and leg stump, gets across and flicks it away to short fine leg for a single
full ball, on off stump, tries to drive, inside edge onto pad
full ball, on off stump, drives to mid-off for a single
short ball, outside off, goes for the cut and misses it
good length ball, on off stump, gets right behind it and defends it back to bowler
short ball, went for the big shot, goes in the air but well short of fielder at point and cover
good length ball, just outside off, punches it away to off side for a single
good length ball, pitches on off stump and angling away, goes for the drive and misses it
That is his maiden fifty in T20I. Back of length, punches it away to off side for a single
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to off side for a single
good length ball, on middle stump, went for the big swing of the bat, got the inner edge and beat the short fine leg fielder for four
slower ball, goes for the big shot and misses it
Shot! Good length ball, just outsde off, another cracking shot, drives on the up and beats the deep cover fielder
full ball, on off stump, drives to wide of mid-off for a single
on middle and leg stump, works away to leg side for a single
Gone! Full and fast, went for the big shot, got a thick inside edge onto stumps
full ball, on off stump, drives to off side
good length ball, on leg stump, tries to flick it away, off the thigh to leg side for a legbye
on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep midwicket for a single
short in length, outside off, cuts it down to third man for a single
good length ball, just outside off, drives and slices it down to third man for a single
back of length, goes for the pull shot, mistimed it to long-on for a single
short in length, punches it away to off side for a single
shor ball, tries to pull, inner edge to wide of short fine leg fielder for couple
short ball, angling in, tries to play a pull shot, misses it and takes it on the body, looks in the rib cage
full ball, goes for the big shot, gets the thick inside edge to deep midwicket for a single
slower ball, gets across and tries to play a chip shot over short fine leg, inside edge onto pad and runs a quick single
Top shot1 Width just outside of, Chigumbura gives himself some room and drives in the gap at extra cover fence for four
short ball, goes for the pull and misses it
on middle and leg stump, driven to deep midwicket for a single
Good length ball, just outside off, drives on the up with open face of the bat and finds the gap at point for four
Back of length, backing away, pulls it away down the ground and no chance at mid-off to stop that one
slower short ball, pulls it away to deep midwicket for a single
good length ball, on off stump, drives on the up to mid-off for a single
from round the wicket, short in length, angling down the leg side and good take by Rizwan
good length ball, backing away, drives to wide of long-on and comes back for the 2nd run
Brilliant shot! From round the wicket, short ball, Chigumbura picks the length early and pulls it away over deep midwicket fence for a six
Back from over the wicket, back of length, on off stump, tries to play on the leg side, leading edge and Hafeez at point takes a good catch
arm ball, on leg stump, came down the wicket to play a big shot, missed it and pad saved him
on middle and leg stump, pushed to long-on for a single
again tossed up, on middle and leg stump, pushed to long-on for a single
faster ball, on leg stump, Fakhar flicked away off his legs and beat the backward square leg fielder for four
on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep midwicket for a single
on middle and leg stump, flicked away to deep midwicket for a single
short in length, on off stump, goes back and angles it down to third man for a single
Dropped! Full ball, just outside off and angling away, goes for the drive, thick outside edge and skipper at the slip put down a tough chance
good length ball, pitches on off stump and angling in, hits the thigh pad
Shot! Full ball, just outside off, leans well forward and drives to extra cover fence for four
good length ball, just outside off, tries to cut and bottom edge to off side
short in length, angling down the leg side for a wide
full ball, on off stump, drives to mid-off for a single
good length ball, on target, defended on the front foot
short in length, just outside off, stands tall and cuts it down to third man for couple of runs
Short ball, Babar picks up the length early, pulls it away, up and over mid-on, once bounce over the fence
fuller in length, on off stump, drives down the ground, long-on fielder was in place, took a single
back of length, goes back and punches to off side
full ball, on leg stump, pushes to mid-on for a quick single
Shot! Width outside off, Fakhar stretches forward and slashes it over point for four
on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side
good length ball, on off stump, opens face of the bat and guides it down to third man
Bang! Good length ball, Fakhar comes down the wicket and hits it up and over deep midwicket fence for a flat six
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to off side
That is a spoor shot. Good length ball, on off stump, Fakhar tries to heave it away, gets the top edge and Chigumbura at mid-on takes a simple catch
full ball, just outside off, tries to steer that one and gets beaten
full ball, on middle stump, defended back to bowler
good length ball, just outside off, punches it to point and good diving save by fielder
Just clear the mid-on fielder. Full ball, on middle and leg stump, drives on the up and in the air just goes over the outstretch hand of mid-on fielder for four
good length ball, just outside off and angling across, tries to steer and beaten again
full ball, outside off, slices in the air down to third man for a single
full ball, from wide of the crease, on middle and leg stump, clipped away to deep square leg
full ball, yorker on middle stump, Haider gets across and flicks it away to short fine leg, shout for lbw as bowler thinks ball hits the foot first, turned down by umpire
full ball, on middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on for a single
Poor delivery, short and wide outside off, no pace in it, Babar cracks it away to deep cover fence for four
This time sliding on the pads, Babar this time flicks it away to beat the backward square leg fielder for four more
on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket for a single
arm ball, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep midwicket for a single
short in length, outside off, cuts away to deep point for a single
again short in length, goes back and cuts to deep point
full and fast outside off, driven to deep point
short in length, outside off, goes back and punches to deep cover for a single
short in length, on leg stump, pulls it down to long leg for a single
good length ball, on leg stump, turned to midwicket
short ball, goes for the pull and mistimes to short midwicket
Slightly short in length, Haider this time pulls it away over midwicket for four

What a superb delivery and fantastic catch by Taylor! Full ball, on middle stump and angling across the right hander, Haider tries to play across the line, gets the thick edge and Taylor behind the stumps takes a one handed blinder diving full
good length ball, on leg stump, turned away to deep midwicket for a single
short in length, just ouside off, cuts it late to short third man
tossed up, came down the wicket and tried to drive, inside edge onto pad
arm ball, on off stump, pushed to short cover
full ball, on off stump, driven down the gruond to long-off
again arm ball, on off stump, pushes to cover for a single
Top shot! Tossed up, came down the wicket and inside out drive to extra cover fence for four
good length ball, on leg stump, turned to deep midwicket for a single
What a superb shot by Babar! Full ball, on middle stump, Babar drives with full face of the bat and times it well, goes all the way over long-on fence for a six
Slightly back of length, Babar cuts it away to backward point and no chance for the third man fielder to stop that one
full ball, on off stump, pushed to mid-off for a single
full ball, outside off, drives well but straight to deep cover fielder for a single
short ball, pulled away to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to mid-off and ran a quick single for his fifty
arm ball, on off stump, pushed to cover
short ball, just outside off, cuts it well and goes through the hands of point fielder, deep cover fielder chased hard, and made a sliding save
Short and fast outside off, Babar cuts it late and beats the short third man fielder who chases it hard but ball wins the race
on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg wide with soft hands and came back for the 2nd run
on middle and leg stump, turned to short fine leg for a single
short ball, outside off, cuts to point
on middle and leg stump, flicked away to short fine leg
tossed up, driven down the ground to long-on and good stop by Raza, Babar wanted 2nd runs, rightly sent back by Hafeez
on middle and leg stump, pushed to long-on
What a shot! Short and fast outside of, Babar leans back and cuts it away in the gap between gully and short third man for four
arm ball, on leg stump, flicks away to deep square leg for a single
tossed up, on leg stump, driven to long-on
tossed up, outside off, driven to extra cover for a single
on middle and leg stump, went back and worked away to leg side
on middle and leg stump, swept away to deep square leg
Dropped! Tossed up, came down the wicket and misitmed it to long-off, Muzarbani dropped a simple catch at long-off
on middle and leg stump, turned away to leg side for a single
saw him coming down the wicket, pitched down the leg side, Hafeez padded away
arm ball, on target, Hafeez gets his bat down in time
short in length, outside off, cuts it to gully
Share timing for Hafeez. Low full toss outside off, Hafeez drives with open face of the bat and finds the gap at extra cover for four
on middle and leg stump, turned to leg side
again on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
tossed up, outside off, driven to deep cover
full ball, yorker length, defended back to bowler
Long hop on leg stump, Hafeez goes back and pulls it away into the stands over square leg
tossed up, Hafeez swept away from well outside off to deep midwicket
another poor delivery, asking to hit, short in  length, on leg stump, Babar pulls it away down to fine leg fence for four
tossed up, driven down the ground to long-on
on middle and leg stump, flicked away to long leg for a single
good length ball, sliding down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
again good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
on leg stump, turned away to long leg for a single
back of length, on leg stump, whipped away in the gap to long leg for couple
good length ball, outside off and angling in, Babar stands tall and punches to deep cover
full ball, on off stump, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
full ball, bit slower in pace, a check drive down the ground to long-on
full ball, on middle and leg stump, chips it over midwicket for couple
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
full ball, yorker length, digs out to off side for a single
Full ball, on offs tump, Babar tries to heave it away over midwicket, mistimes it and Madhevere at deep midwicket takes a simple catch
full ball, on off stump, defended to off side
short ball, pulled away and sharp stop by fielder
Shot! Again short in length, Shah this time pulls it up and over midwicket fielder for four
full ball, on middle stump, drives to wide of long-on for a single
Shot! Good length ball, just outside off, Hafeez drives on the up and times it well, just over mid-off fielder for four
on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep midwicket for a single
short in length, on leg stump, clips the thigh and races away down to fine leg fence for four legbyes
Good length ball, just outside off and angling in, goes through the gate and looks a little inside edge onto stumps
full ball, on target, defended back to bowler
comes down the track and defended to off side

Good length ball, on leg stump, Rizwan tries to flick it away, misses it and off the pad to fine leg, big shout for lbw, turned down by umpire, Zimbabwe asked for the review but the ball was missing leg
